title: Only Forever
description: From USA TODAY bestselling author Alex Lux, comes a short story of love inspired by true events. One girl + one boy + one pair of bellbottoms = true love Her life had fallen apart when her ex-husband came out of the closet and admitted he was guy. His life had stagnated in a loveless relationship with a women he'd agreed to marry. Fate changed everything using the most unlikely catalyst: A pair of bellbottoms. *** This short story is a contemporary romance inspired by the true story of how the author's parents met and fell in love. There is no explicit sexual content in this story. It is suitable for anyone who still believes in love and happily ever afters, or anyone who would like to believe again.
author: Kimberly Kinrade
